name: Trade Rivals: Goblin Age
storyline:
Lord Thork Ranson rules over Ranorya, one of the most prosperous trading hubs on the continent. He enforces a unique rule for conducting business within its walls to test incoming merchants and ensure the city's safety. Four new merchants are selected each month to undergo a trial, where only one can prevail. The merchant who earns the most profit garners the greatest reputation, or simply survives without going bankrupt will be granted a license to trade in the city for an entire year.
Our game is built around this story, offering players a competitive and thrilling trading experience.
summary: In Trade Rivals - Goblin Age, you’ll manage your medieval shop in a vibrant world filled with goblins, wizards, elves, and humans. Your goal? Dominate the market by mastering pricing strategies, securing rare goods, and outmaneuvering your competitors. But beware—your rivals won’t play fair. They’ll curse your business or snatch deals right from under your nose!
